name: helpME
description:
story:

You are watching the firework show when you get a call saying "dont go to the carnival", and out of curiousity, you go.

Inspired mostly by:

Baldis basics and IMSCARED.

Controls:

WASD to move

shift to run

tab for minimap

c to unlock and lock cursor

LeftClick to pick up items

RightClick to drop all items

Objective:

Get the 1 fake ticket, then the real one. (the number in the top right corner is the distance from you to the ticket you need)

Characters:

him (square guy, dont get caught)

caffeen man (slows down your controls alot)

sad sun and mad moon (fog up your screen)

zero (sucks you in if you get too close)

girtha (throws boulders at you, dodge them)

cleaner (opens the doors)

treeman (alerts him (the first character) where you are when too close)

There are 3 endings:

good

bad

secret

Thanks to my friend for playing this:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYMm5cSRSop6wDNVRnvHGtg
